text: læa mimi phu bæk phara khn dı thi ca bæk phara khxng phu xun di læa tha phu thi bæk phara hnak xyu læw khxrxng (phu xun) hı chwy bæk man k ca mimi sing dı thuk bæk xxk cak khea thung mæwa khea ca pen yati snith ktam thæcring cea pen pheiyng phu takteuxn brrda phu kerng klaw phracea khxng phwk khea nı sing renlab læa phwk khea darng wi sung kar lahmad læa phu dı khadkela tnxeng thæcring khea k khadkela pheux taw khxng khea xeng læa yang xallxhˌ theanan khux kark lab pi
